# EuroleagueR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Version-Number](https://img.shields.io/github/r-package/v/JaseZiv/euroleagueR?label=euroleagueR (Dev))](https://github.com/JaseZiv/euroleagueR/)
<!-- badges: end -->

## Overview

This package is designed to allow users to obtain clean and tidy data from the Euroleague Basketball competition.


## Installation

Currently, this library is not yet on CRAN, so you can install the dev version of [**```euroleagueR```**](https://github.com/JaseZiv/euroleagueR/) from [GitHub](https://github.com/JaseZiv/euroleagueR) with:

```{r gh-installation, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JaseZiv/euroleagueR")
library(euroleagueR)
```
